name: Agony of The Fallen
description:
Agony of The Fallen, 

Secret agent J.W. has been dispatched to Newark University Hospital to recover reports regarding the Virus caused by the Fungs, KAR-2-SER.  The Hospital went under breakout quarantine after an urgent radio call came from HQ stating that patients went committing mass-murdering of staff and other patients...  

The hospital is marked as a threat level 4, please take into consideration that if you fall... we will not get you back... 

(((( Please note that this was made in a 3 Day Game jam, therefore there are many bugs both known and unknown))))

Controls: 

W,A,S,D  - Movement
Ctrl + Movement = Sliding

R - Reload

LMB - Shoot 



Credits: 

Yehia Elzoridy - Game Programmer 

Gun Mechanics- Movement Mechanics- AI- General Game Settings

Abdallah Mohammed - Textures Graphic Artist

Lighting- UV& Textures- level Design

What was done: 

Full texture & UV rework 
Lightmaps & light from scratch
AI, Gun Mechanics, Character Movement coded for the game specifically 

Assets that were used: 

- Sound Effects - FreeSound.org, Zapsplatter.com.

- Guns used - Weapon Pack Epic marketplace.

- Animations- Maximo.

- VFX - Niagara Realistic Starter VFX Pack.

- Medical Models - SketchFap.
